episodes.title: Faladev #30 | The importance of contribution in Open Source
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, João Pedro, Diego Haz and Bruno Lemos
episodes.description:
In this episode of Faladev, Diego Fernandes meets with João Pedro Schmitz, Bruno Lemos and Diego Haz, to discuss the importance of the open source contribution and what challenges circulate in the community.

We spend most of time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast.

episodes.title: Faladev #29 | Two different perspectives at the table: a conversation about PF and OOP
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda
episodes.description:
Diego and Dani welcomed Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda to the Faladev table to talk about functional programming and object-oriented programming.

Market analysis, concepts in practice and challenges in adopting any development method. All this in a dynamic and relevant conversation for our audience.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast.

episodes.title: Faladev #28 | Behind barriers and solutions proposed by micro-services
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Wesley Williams and Lucas Santos
episodes.description:
Developers Wesley Williams and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev to have a conversation about what micro-services are and what are the challenges and barriers of their application.

In this issue, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation by raising relevant topics and questions about the subject.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

episodes.description:
Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista welcomed Otávio Lemos and Rodrigo Branas to chat about modern development architectures, applied in the technology industry.

What are the fundamentals, principles and importance of debating architectures in this ecosystem?

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we gather technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

episodes.title: Faladev #26 | Special: exclusive interview with José Valim, creator of the Elixir language
episodes.description:
Nthis special end-of-season edition we had the opportunity to have a conversation with José Valim, Brazilian dev who created the Elixir programming language — used internationally in several technologies, including Discord and Pinterest.

The topic of the week turned into several processes involved in the creation of a new language, which proposes to be an efficient alternative in the technology market.

In addition to all this, Valim was able to talk about a lot of code and about his journey and experience in creating an active community behind open source.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the orbit of programming.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various subjects that matter to your dev career.

episodes.title: Faladev #25 | What is UX/UI?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Tiago Luchtenberg and Thainan Librelon
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various subjects that matter to your dev career.

p>In this episode, Diego Fernandes meets with Thainan Librelon and Tiago Luchtenberg to discuss: Can a developer do UI/UX work, what impact? When is the ideal time to have people specialized in UX and UI? And after all, what is UI and what is UX?

episodes.title: Faladev #24 | How to become a development leader?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, João Paulo and Cleiton Souza
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the orbit of programming.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various subjects that matter to your dev career. In this episode, Diego Fernandes meets with Cleiton Souza and João Paulo de Magalhães to discuss leadership, considering professional, technical and even emotional aspects, what does being a development leader involve? After all, what is a development leader?

episodes.title: FalaDev #23 | What do communities have to do with technology?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Isabela Castilho and João Inácio
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three technology professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about various subjects that matter to your dev career.

p>In this first episode of the new season, Diego Fernandes meets with Isabela Castilho and João Inácio Neto (Biro) to discuss communities and the impact they have on the career of devs in search of the next level. After all, what is a community and what does it have to do with technology?
